org.apache.openmeetings.webservice

Class RoomWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.RoomWebService

  • @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
@Path(value="/room")
public class RoomWebService
extends Object
    RoomService contains methods to manipulate rooms and create invitation hash
    Author:
    sebawagner

      Create a Invitation hash and optionally send it by mail the From to Date is as String as some SOAP libraries do not accept Date Objects in SOAP Calls Date is parsed as dd.mm.yyyy, time as hh:mm (don't forget the leading zero's)

    • Method Detail

      • getRoomsPublic

        public Room[] getRoomsPublic(String SID,
                    Long roomtypes_id)
                      throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Returns an Object of Type RoomsList which contains a list of Room-Objects. Every Room-Object contains a Roomtype and all informations about that Room. The List of current-users in the room is Null if you get them via SOAP. The Roomtype can be 1 for conference rooms or 2 for audience rooms.
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        roomtypes_id -
        Returns:
        - list of public rooms
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

        max - - The maximum you want to get

        asc - - Asc or Desc sort ordering

      • getRoomsWithCurrentUsers

        public RoomSearchResult getRoomsWithCurrentUsers(String SID,
                                        int start,
                                        int max,
                                        String orderby,
                                        boolean asc)
        Returns a List of Objects of Rooms You can use "name" as value for orderby or rooms_id. It also fills the attribute currentUsers in the Room-Object
        Parameters:
        SID - - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        start - - The id you want to start
        max - - The maximum you want to get
        orderby - - The column it will be ordered
        asc - - Asc or Desc sort ordering
        Returns:
        - List of Objects of Rooms

      • addRoomWithModeration

        public Long addRoomWithModeration(String SID,
                         String name,
                         Long roomtypes_id,
                         String comment,
                         Long numberOfPartizipants,
                         Boolean ispublic,
                         Boolean appointment,
                         Boolean isDemoRoom,
                         Integer demoTime,
                         Boolean isModeratedRoom)
        Create a conference room
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        name - Name of the Room
        roomtypes_id - Type of that room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)
        comment - any comment
        numberOfPartizipants - the maximum users allowed in this room
        ispublic - If this room is public (use true if you don't deal with different Organizations)
        appointment - is it a Calendar Room (use false by default)
        isDemoRoom - is it a Demo Room with limited time (use false by default)
        demoTime - time in seconds after the user will be logged out (only enabled if isDemoRoom is true)
        isModeratedRoom - Users have to wait untill a Moderator arrives. Use the becomeModerator param in setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash to set a user as default Moderator
        Returns:
        - id of the room or error code

      • addRoomWithModerationAndQuestions

        public Long addRoomWithModerationAndQuestions(String SID,
                                     String name,
                                     Long roomtypes_id,
                                     String comment,
                                     Long numberOfPartizipants,
                                     Boolean ispublic,
                                     Boolean appointment,
                                     Boolean isDemoRoom,
                                     Integer demoTime,
                                     Boolean isModeratedRoom,
                                     Boolean allowUserQuestions)
        this SOAP Method has an additional param to enable or disable the buttons to apply for moderation this does only work in combination with the room-type restricted
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        name - Name of the Room
        roomtypes_id - Type of that room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)
        comment - any comment
        numberOfPartizipants - the maximum users allowed in this room
        ispublic - If this room is public (use true if you don't deal with different Organizations)
        appointment - is it a Calendar Room (use false by default)
        isDemoRoom - is it a Demo Room with limited time (use false by default)
        demoTime - time in seconds after the user will be logged out (only enabled if isDemoRoom is true)
        isModeratedRoom - Users have to wait untill a Moderator arrives. Use the becomeModerator param in setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash to set a user as default Moderator
        allowUserQuestions - enable or disable the button to allow users to apply for moderation
        Returns:
        - id of the room or error code

      • addRoomWithModerationQuestionsAndAudioType

        public Long addRoomWithModerationQuestionsAndAudioType(String SID,
                                              String name,
                                              Long roomtypes_id,
                                              String comment,
                                              Long numberOfPartizipants,
                                              Boolean ispublic,
                                              Boolean appointment,
                                              Boolean isDemoRoom,
                                              Integer demoTime,
                                              Boolean isModeratedRoom,
                                              Boolean allowUserQuestions,
                                              Boolean isAudioOnly)
                                                throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        adds a new room with options for user questions and audio only
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        name - Name of the Room
        roomtypes_id - Type of that room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)
        comment - any comment
        numberOfPartizipants - the maximum users allowed in this room
        ispublic - If this room is public (use true if you don't deal with different Organizations)
        appointment - is it a Calendar Room (use false by default)
        isDemoRoom - is it a Demo Room with limited time (use false by default)
        demoTime - time in seconds after the user will be logged out (only enabled if isDemoRoom is true)
        isModeratedRoom - Users have to wait until a Moderator arrives. Use the becomeModerator param in setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash to set a user as default Moderator
        allowUserQuestions - enable or disable the button to allow users to apply for moderation
        isAudioOnly - enable or disable the video / or audio-only
        Returns:
        - id of the room or error code
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • addRoomWithModerationQuestionsAudioTypeAndHideOptions

        public Long addRoomWithModerationQuestionsAudioTypeAndHideOptions(String SID,
                                                         String name,
                                                         Long roomtypes_id,
                                                         String comment,
                                                         Long numberOfPartizipants,
                                                         Boolean ispublic,
                                                         Boolean appointment,
                                                         Boolean isDemoRoom,
                                                         Integer demoTime,
                                                         Boolean isModeratedRoom,
                                                         Boolean allowUserQuestions,
                                                         Boolean isAudioOnly,
                                                         Boolean hideTopBar,
                                                         Boolean hideChat,
                                                         Boolean hideActivitiesAndActions,
                                                         Boolean hideFilesExplorer,
                                                         Boolean hideActionsMenu,
                                                         Boolean hideScreenSharing,
                                                         Boolean hideWhiteboard)
                                                           throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        adds a new room with options for user questions, audio only and hide
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        name - Name of the Room
        roomtypes_id - Type of that room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)
        comment - any comment
        numberOfPartizipants - the maximum users allowed in this room
        ispublic - If this room is public (use true if you don't deal with different Organizations)
        appointment - is it a Calendar Room (use false by default)
        isDemoRoom - is it a Demo Room with limited time (use false by default)
        demoTime - time in seconds after the user will be logged out (only enabled if isDemoRoom is true)
        isModeratedRoom - Users have to wait until a Moderator arrives. Use the becomeModerator param in setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash to set a user as default Moderator
        allowUserQuestions - enable or disable the button to allow users to apply for moderation
        isAudioOnly - enable or disable the video / or audio-only
        hideTopBar - hide or show TopBar
        hideChat - hide or show Chat
        hideActivitiesAndActions - hide or show Activities And Actions
        hideFilesExplorer - hide or show Files Explorer
        hideActionsMenu - hide or show Actions Menu
        hideScreenSharing - hide or show Screen Sharing
        hideWhiteboard - hide or show Whiteboard. If whitboard is hidden, video pods and scrollbar appear instead.
        Returns:
        - id of the room or error code
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • getRoomIdByExternalId

        public Long getRoomIdByExternalId(String SID,
                         String name,
                         Long roomtypes_id,
                         String comment,
                         Long numberOfPartizipants,
                         Boolean ispublic,
                         Boolean appointment,
                         Boolean isDemoRoom,
                         Integer demoTime,
                         Boolean isModeratedRoom,
                         Long externalRoomId,
                         String externalRoomType)
                           throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Checks if a room with this exteralRoomId + externalRoomType does exist, if yes it returns the room id if not, it will create the room and then return the room id of the newly created room
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        name - Name of the room
        roomtypes_id - Type of that room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)
        comment - any comment
        numberOfPartizipants - the maximum users allowed in this room
        ispublic - If this room is public (use true if you don't deal with different Organizations)
        appointment - is it a Calendar Room? (use false if not sure what that means)
        isDemoRoom - is it a Demo Room with limited time? (use false if not sure what that means)
        demoTime - time in seconds after the user will be logged out (only enabled if isDemoRoom is true)
        isModeratedRoom - Users have to wait untill a Moderator arrives. Use the becomeModerator param in setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash to set a user as default Moderator
        externalRoomId - your external room id may set here
        externalRoomType - you can specify your system-name or type of room here, for example "moodle"
        Returns:
        - id of the room or error code
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

        roomtypes_id - new type of room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)

        numberOfPartizipants - number of participants
        ispublic - is public
        appointment - if the room is an appointment (use false if not sure what that means)

        demoTime - time in seconds after the user will be logged out (only enabled if isDemoRoom is true)

        hideFilesExplorer - hide or show Files Explorer
        hideActionsMenu - hide or show Actions Menu
        hideScreenSharing - hide or show Screen Sharing
        hideWhiteboard - hide or show Whiteboard. If whitboard is hidden, video pods and scrollbar appear instead.

        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        name - new name of the room
        roomtypes_id - new type of room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)
        comment - new comment

      • getInvitationHash

        public String getInvitationHash(String SID,
                       String username,
                       Long room_id,
                       Boolean isPasswordProtected,
                       String invitationpass,
                       Integer valid,
                       String validFromDate,
                       String validFromTime,
                       String validToDate,
                       String validToTime)
                         throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Create a Invitation hash and optionally send it by mail the From to Date is as String as some SOAP libraries do not accept Date Objects in SOAP Calls Date is parsed as dd.mm.yyyy, time as hh:mm (don't forget the leading zero's)
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin a valid Session Token
        username - the username of the User that he will get
        room_id - the conference room id of the invitation
        isPasswordProtected - if the invitation is password protected
        invitationpass - the password for accessing the conference room via the invitation hash
        valid - the type of validation for the hash 1: endless, 2: from-to period, 3: one-time
        validFromDate - Date in Format of dd.mm.yyyy only of interest if valid is type 2
        validFromTime - time in Format of hh:mm only of interest if valid is type 2
        validToDate - Date in Format of dd.mm.yyyy only of interest if valid is type 2
        validToTime - time in Format of hh:mm only of interest if valid is type 2
        Returns:
        a HASH value that can be made into a URL with http://$OPENMEETINGS_HOST :$PORT/openmeetings/?invitationHash="+invitationsHash;
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • sendInvitationHash

        public String sendInvitationHash(String SID,
                        String username,
                        String message,
                        String email,
                        String subject,
                        Long room_id,
                        String conferencedomain,
                        Boolean isPasswordProtected,
                        String invitationpass,
                        Integer valid,
                        String validFromDate,
                        String validFromTime,
                        String validToDate,
                        String validToTime,
                        Long language_id,
                        Boolean sendMail)
                          throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Create a Invitation hash and optionally send it by mail the From to Date is as String as some SOAP libraries do not accept Date Objects in SOAP Calls Date is parsed as dd.mm.yyyy, time as hh:mm (don't forget the leading zero's)
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin a valid Session Token
        username - the Username of the User that he will get
        message - the Message in the Email Body send with the invitation if sendMail is true
        email - the Email to send the invitation to if sendMail is true
        subject - the subject of the Email send with the invitation if sendMail is true
        room_id - the conference room id of the invitation
        conferencedomain - the domain of the room (keep empty)
        isPasswordProtected - if the invitation is password protected
        invitationpass - the password for accessing the conference room via the invitation hash
        valid - the type of validation for the hash 1: endless, 2: from-to period, 3: one-time
        validFromDate - Date in Format of dd.mm.yyyy only of interest if valid is type 2
        validFromTime - time in Format of hh:mm only of interest if valid is type 2
        validToDate - Date in Format of dd.mm.yyyy only of interest if valid is type 2
        validToTime - time in Format of hh:mm only of interest if valid is type 2
        language_id - the language id of the EMail that is send with the invitation if sendMail is true
        sendMail - if sendMail is true then the RPC-Call will send the invitation to the email
        Returns:
        a HASH value that can be made into a URL with http://$OPENMEETINGS_HOST :$PORT/openmeetings/?invitationHash="+invitationsHash;
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • sendInvitationHashWithDateObject

        public String sendInvitationHashWithDateObject(String SID,
                                      String username,
                                      String message,
                                      String email,
                                      String subject,
                                      Long room_id,

                                      Date toDate,
                                      Long language_id,
                                      Boolean sendMail)
                                        throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Create a Invitation hash and optionally send it by mail the From to Date is as String as some SOAP libraries do not accept Date Objects in SOAP Calls Date is parsed as dd.mm.yyyy, time as hh:mm (don't forget the leading zero's)
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin a valid Session Token
        username - the Username of the User that he will get
        message - the Message in the Email Body send with the invitation if sendMail is true
        email - the Email to send the invitation to if sendMail is true
        subject - the subject of the Email send with the invitation if sendMail is true
        room_id - the conference room id of the invitation
        conferencedomain - the domain of the room (keep empty)
        isPasswordProtected - if the invitation is password protected
        invitationpass - the password for accessing the conference room via the invitation hash
        valid - the type of validation for the hash 1: endless, 2: from-to period, 3: one-time
        fromDate - Date as Date Object only of interest if valid is type 2
        toDate - Date as Date Object only of interest if valid is type 2
        language_id - the language id of the EMail that is send with the invitation if sendMail is true
        sendMail - if sendMail is true then the RPC-Call will send the invitation to the email
        Returns:
        a HASH value that can be made into a URL with http://$OPENMEETINGS_HOST :$PORT/openmeetings/?invitationHash="+invitationsHash;
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • addRoomWithModerationAndExternalTypeAndStartEnd

        public Long addRoomWithModerationAndExternalTypeAndStartEnd(String SID,
                                                   String name,
                                                   Long roomtypes_id,
                                                   String comment,
                                                   Long numberOfPartizipants,
                                                   Boolean ispublic,
                                                   Boolean appointment,
                                                   Boolean isDemoRoom,
                                                   Integer demoTime,
                                                   Boolean isModeratedRoom,
                                                   String externalRoomType,
                                                   String validFromDate,
                                                   String validFromTime,
                                                   String validToDate,
                                                   String validToTime,
                                                   Boolean isPasswordProtected,
                                                   String password,
                                                   Long reminderTypeId,
                                                   String redirectURL)
                                                     throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Adds a conference room that is only available for a period of time
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        name - new name of the room
        roomtypes_id - new type of room (1 = Conference, 2 = Audience, 3 = Restricted, 4 = Interview)
        comment - new comment
        numberOfPartizipants - new numberOfParticipants
        ispublic - is public
        appointment - if the room is an appointment
        isDemoRoom - is it a Demo Room with limited time? (use false if not sure what that means)
        demoTime - time in seconds after the user will be logged out (only enabled if isDemoRoom is true)
        isModeratedRoom - Users have to wait until a Moderator arrives. Use the becomeModerator parameter in setUserObjectAndGenerateRoomHash to set a user as default Moderator
        externalRoomType - the external room type (can be used to identify different external systems using same OpenMeetings instance)
        validFromDate - valid from as Date format: dd.MM.yyyy
        validFromTime - valid to as time format: mm:hh
        validToDate - valid to Date format: dd.MM.yyyy
        validToTime - valid to time format: mm:hh
        isPasswordProtected - If the links send via EMail to invited people is password protected
        password - Password for Invitations send via Mail
        reminderTypeId - 1=none, 2=simple mail, 3=ICAL
        redirectURL - URL Users will be lead to if the Conference Time is elapsed
        Returns:
        - id of the room in case of success, error code otherwise
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • closeRoom

        public int closeRoom(String SID,
            Long room_id,
            Boolean status)
              throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Method to remotely close or open rooms. If a room is closed all users inside the room and all users that try to enter it will be redirected to the redirectURL that is defined in the Room-Object. Returns positive value if authentication was successful.
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        room_id - the room id
        status - false = close, true = open
        Returns:
        - 1 in case of success, -2 otherwise
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException

      • modifyRoomParameter

        public int modifyRoomParameter(String SID,
                      Long room_id,
                      String paramName,
                      Object paramValue)
                        throws org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException
        Method to update arbitrary room parameter.
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        room_id - the room id
        paramName -
        paramValue -
        Returns:
        1 in case of success, -2 if permissions are insufficient
        Throws:
        org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.dto.ServiceException - if any error occurred

      • addRoomToOrg

        public Long addRoomToOrg(String SID,
                Long rooms_id,
                Long organisation_id)
        Adds a room to an organization
        Parameters:
        SID - - The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin
        rooms_id - - Id of room to be added
        organisation_id - - Id of organisation that the room is being paired with
        Returns:
        Id of the relation created, null or -1 in case of the error
